    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Trajanje tonov</string>
            <string language="en">Duration of a note</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dauer einer Anmerkung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Durée d'une note</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duração de uma nota</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Durata di una nota</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"διάρκεια" μιας σημείωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Duración de una nota</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci že vedo, da tone zapisujemo z notami. S shematskim prikazom jim pomagamo, da si trajanje-dolžino tonov lažje predstavljajo. Iz slike lahko tudi vizualno razberejo razmerja med tonskimi trajanji.</string>
            <string language="en">Duration of different music notes (whole note, half note, quarter note, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trajanje</string>
            <string language="en">duration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">merjenje</string>
            <string language="en">measuring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nota</string>
            <string language="en">note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trajanje note</string>
            <string language="en">note value</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dauer der unterschiedlichen Musikanmerkungen 
(vollständige Anmerkung, halbe Anmerkung, Viertelanmerkung...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Durée de différentes notes de musique (ronde, 
demi de note, note quarte...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duração de notas diferentes da música (nota 
inteira, meia nota, nota de um quarto...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Durata delle note differenti di musica (nota 
intera, nota mezza, nota quarta...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"διάρκεια" των διαφορετικών σημειώσεων μουσικής 
(ολόκληρη σημείωση, μισή σημείωση, σημείωση τετάρτων...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Duración de diversas notas de la música (nota 
entera, media nota, nota cuarta...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dauer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beachten Sie Wert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">durée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mesure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">notez la valeur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">duração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">medição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">nota</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">anote o valor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">durata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">misurazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nota</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">noti il valore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nota</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
